Solina promised to dedicate his life to Einhasad to humble service to the forgiveness of her sins, the sins of her father and the entire imperial house. But the earnest prayer of a young Solina not softened the heart of an angry goddess. For the great sins of the father Solina Baium goddess took away her sight and only humbled his anger. Solina meekly accepted the punishment and continued to serve the goddess, carrying the burden of the sins of the imperial family.
Solina led a modest life of a hermit, steadfastly enduring all the hardships. Her kindness and compassion made ​​famous by her throughout Elmoreden, whose residents Solina revered as a saint.
